titleStmt.title: You perceive by His Majesties letters patents for rebuilding the Cathedral Church of St. Pauls how zealously His Majesty is concerned to have this so pious and charitable work effectually carried on ...
titleStmt.author: Compton, Henry, 1623-1713.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Bishop Henry Compton by Wing. Dated at end: xiv. Jun. 1678.
Title from first words of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Birmingham Central Library (Birmingham, England).
